thread.title: Bonnie
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Bonnie

author: Bonnie
title: Bonnie
text:
Cori was reassuring and very competent. She made me feel comfortable in making a very difficult decision at a very sensitive time in my life. I`m so glad I found her through David Sklar and Associates. Today is the first day
of spring and I`m feeling brand new.
Thank you Cori!
